full_summary:
# General Tender Information

* **Solicitation Reference:** EF245-231427-3
* **Tender Title [EN]:** RFP for the acquisition, delivery, installation of Workspaces category 1, 2, 5 SA E60PQ-140003 for DND
* **Tender Title [FR]:** DDP for the acquisition, delivery, installation of Office furniture category 1, 2, 5 AMA E60PQ-140003 for MDN
* **Publication Date:** February 15, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 28, 2023, 14:00 EST

## Request for Proposal (RFP) Details

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) for the acquisition, delivery, and installation of workspaces (office furniture) category 1, 2, 5 SA E60PQ-140003 located in Montréal, Québec, Canada.

## Contract Terms

* The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
* The expected contract start date is none, and the expected contract end date is August 1, 2023.
* The selection criteria are based on the lowest price.

## Tender Submission Requirements

* By February 28, 2023, at 14:00 EST, interested suppliers must submit all required supporting documentation and bids.
* All bids submitted after 14:00 EST on February 28, 2023, will be declared non-responsive.
* Suppliers who submitted an offer under the previous solicitation (Doc3814187206 - EF245-231427) may request a debriefing or feedback meeting.

## Contact Information

* The contact person is Julien, Lisa-Marie (SPAC/PSPC). Her email is [lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)  and she can be reached through email.
